attributes.action: increase the efficiency standards of commercial prime cooking and refrigeration equipment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Commercial kitchens are major consumers of energy and emit over 18 million tonnes of Carbon Dioxide due to the energy sapping products they have 'back of house.'  However, simply by specifying more efficient equipment substantial reductions in both energy use and Carbon Dioxide emissions can be achieved. 

Changes to regulation are slow to appear as Government do not understand what regulations are required.  We believe the time has come to introduce new rules governing the foodservice industry.  

Minimum efficiency levels for ALL commercial prime cooking and refrigeration equipment must be increased and current regulation amended to ensure these changes are adopted by the foodservice industry.
